title: 1999/504/EC: Commission Decision of 1 July 1999 fixing an indicative allocation by Member State of the commitment appropriations for Objective 2 of the Structural Funds for the period 2000 to 2006 (notified under document number C(1999) 1772)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 1 July 1999
fixing an indicative allocation by Member State of the commitment appropriations for Objective 2 of the Structural Funds for the period 2000 to 2006
(notified under document number C(1999) 1772)
(1999/504/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The indicative amounts by Member State of the commitment appropriations for Objective 2 for 2000 to 2006 shall be as set out in Annex I.
The indicative amounts by Member State of the commitment appropriations for transitional support under Objective 2 for 2000 to 2005 shall be as set out in Annex II.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 July 1999.
For the Commission
Monika WULF-MATHIES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 161, 26.6.1999, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 185, 15.7.1988, p. 9.
(3) OJ L 337, 24.12.1994, p. 11.
